alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Somerset, southwestern Wicomico and southeastern Dorchester Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Deal Island, or 13 miles northwest of Princess Anne, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Somerset, southwestern Wicomico and southeastern Dorchester Counties, including the following locations... Green Hill, Wetipquin, Waterview, Trinity, Royal Oak, Eden, Dames Quarter, Allen, Whitehaven and Widgeon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Maryland.
